page.title: 04People,Houses & Jobs:Dorset.
page.content: We visited some of the new housing estates on the west side of the B3072 between Crab Orchard and Three Legged Cross.The houses have been built over the last 7 years and prices range from about Â£30000 to Â£55000. We found that the cheaper houses in this area are generally owned by people who worked locally,families in which the father was a builder, gardener ,plumber or carpenter.In families with school-aged children , the mother too worked locally. Many of the more expensive homes are owned by people who commute daily to work,travelling to Bournemouth , Poole,Blandford,Fordingbridge or Christchurch.In this group we found company directors,draftsmen,serveyors, and those working in banking,computer firms and engineering.Some wives worked locally others commuted daily.
